title: Can women go alone  with driver within the city?
transcript: asks in the third question what's the ruling on being alone with the driver within the city um and he is taking us to Quran uh classes or to learn the dean the answer was given to us by the prophet Alat who said that it is not permissible for a man to be in seclusion with a woman and whenever a man is in seclusion with a woman then the shatan is their third so if we look at that vehicle the driver and the woman they're two so the third one is Shan without any doubt and this is totally prohibited Muhammad from
